Articles.Content: I've always loved B9 but the new giant parts make it completely unusable on my PC could someone make a stripped down version plz with only the stuff from prior to the HX parts?
You can this yourself VERY easy. Install B9 as usual, then delete the HX parts. It IS as easy as that.
yeah but why cant there be an quicker way for those who cant.

> 
> yeah but why cant there be an quicker way for those who cant.

If you don't have time to delete all of the HX parts, how do you have enough time to play KSP?

> 
> If you don't have time to delete all of the HX parts, how do you have enough time to play KSP?

I would just like to not have to constantly experiment with other peoples mods.
Trust me, it's more of a pain for a modder to maintain two separate versions than it is to just delete some files out of your install.
